mapper.select: SELECT c.product_id productId, c.old_sell_price oldSellPrice, c.new_sell_price newSellPrice, p.create_time createTime, p.title, p.image FROM products_price_change c, products p WHERE c.product_id = p.id ORDER BY c.create_time desc
SELECT o.user_id userId, sum(o.price) price FROM user_order o,users u WHERE o.type = 2 and o.user_id=u.id and u.type=2 AND o.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY o.user_id
